description:
Fuel for your fire. A self-sealing valve allows removal of partially consumed canisters for packing or travel.

  • Isobutene/propane blend performs well at cooler temperatures
  • Designed for use with GSI Pinnacle Stoves
  • Nests inside nForm cooking systems
  • Dimensions are 11 x 9.4cm
name: GSI Isobutane 230g Fuel Canister
